subject: Follow-up on HVAC Maintenance
message: Hi Sarah, just following up on the HVAC maintenance we completed yesterday. Everything is running smoothly. Let us know if you have any concerns.

subject: Scheduling Next Service
message: Called to schedule quarterly maintenance. Sarah confirmed next appointment for February 15th at 10 AM.

subject: Quote Request - Office Renovation
message: Thank you for your interest in our services. Please find attached the detailed quote for your office renovation project.

subject: Project Completion Confirmation
message: Great working with you on the studio lighting project! All fixtures have been installed and tested. Invoice attached.

subject: Emergency Repair Request
message: Emily called about urgent electrical issue in main studio. Scheduled emergency visit for same day at 2 PM.
